fixed: Fixed `claim` crashes when there was no Patreon API key.
improved: Are you a Patreon creator and hosting Bastion yourself? The `patrons` command will now show your patrons and not the patrons of the Bastion bot project.
`clearWarn`, `removeAllRoles`, `deafen`, `kick`, `mute` and `warn` commands can be used with the ID of the user. No need to mention them anymore.
